meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of a transaction
meanings.sent1: The transactional process was straightforward and simple.
meanings.sent2: She preferred a transactional approach to business dealings.
meanings.sent3: The cat's transactional behavior at the pet store was amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: His transactional attitude towards friendships made him seem distant.
meanings.sent5: The transactional nature of the agreement made it easy to understand.

meanings.definition: involving or relating to the exchange of goods or services
meanings.sent1: Their transactional interactions were always efficient.
meanings.sent2: The company's success was due to its strong transactional strategies.
meanings.sent3: The robot's transactional abilities in the marketplace were quite impressive.
meanings.sent4: The transactional nature of the economy kept things moving smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The transactional nature of the trade deal benefited both parties.
